Description: Clay tablet; nearly complete; legal dispute over an exchange of fields; seals; Old Babylonian; repaired.
Bibliographic references: Leichty E et al 1988a / Catalogue of the Babylonian Tablets in the British Museum, volume VIII: Tablets from Sippar 3 (p.218)
Frayne, RIME 4 / Old Babylonian Period (2003-1595 BC) (RIM.E.4.3.7.2006)
Acquisition name: From: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
